Judul: Design Simulation Program of Runway Capacity Using Genetic Algorithm at Soekarno-Hatta
Abstrak:
The purposes of this research are to calculate the capacity of runway with runway capacity simulation software using
Genetic Algorithm, and to analyze the efforts which have more profound effect. To enhance the runway capacity, some strategies
are researched, such as reduction of separation to meet criteria set by FAA’s rule, addition of the exit taxiway, addition of the
runway according to master plan of Soekamo-Hatta Airport and changing the runway utilization strategies. Out of the four
strategies, the most efficient solution is changing the runway utilization strategies and reduction in separation. However, the
addition of runway has the highest capacity increase.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Hoga Saragih, Wisnu Darjono Tulodo Utomo, Rusdianto Roestam
Sumber: International Journal of Electrical and Computer Engineering (IJECE) Vol.1, No.2, December 2011, pp. 202~212 ISSN: 2088-8708
